content: Not got 2 this 1 yet, but I will! Very fun& entertaining stories! I'm on 2nd book now. Love them!
One of the best role playing games in the market. Very easy to learn, and play.

I'm so frustrated and disappointed. This is just down right depressing. I'm SICK of dying over and over and over. I can't get out. Everyone around me irl suggest I give up because dying in so many ways so many times, only to think you finally made it but get sent out to the beginning AGAIN puts me in a very foul and bitter mood. Even the damn game ask "WHY CONTINUE?" It is pessimistic, downcasting, belittling, and frustrating. Wtg dev's, now I need a fk'ng shrink again.‚ò†Ô∏è üòêüòìüòµüò∞‚ò†Ô∏è

Just finished all 4 parts, could not stop playing. The story is great, the gameplay is phenomenal. Everything is smooth. Not a single crash in all 4 parts. Possibly one of the best mobile games I have played
Amazing game, truly one of a kind

Terrific way to end a series. As expected, there are multiple ways to finish the story on several layers. Plus, mexhanics that were hinted at in earlier chapters take center stage in the climax. Awesome series.
An excellent conclusion to a fantastic storyline. Don't let the absence of no rewind discourage you; on the contrary there are many fun twists that come with this game mechanic.
Just try for yourself

Just an awesome series of games. The option to buy them all together would be great, as you will want to play them all as soon as you finish the first. SORCERY 4 throws in a surprise twist mechanic near the beginning, which helps it stand out and above the previous games in the series. I just wanted it to go on forever, great job Inkle!
I think about the ending to this game all the time and replay it for that alone
Amazing experience!!!üòé
Unable to install and unable to get a refund. Poor service.
Really says a lot about a series when the weakest entry is still an incredible game

As most have already said, the removal of the rewind function somewhat  killed it. As understandable as it is for you to do it for the sake of  impact, adding ZEd, a more tedious rewind, only killed your efforts. In my  opinion you should have either kept rewind or make it so that you can  rewind to the point where your death was settled at most. Each and every  action feels like a potential annoyance rather than a danger. The weakest  in the Sorcery! series, but I still absolutely recommend it.
Fantastic Conclusion
Fantastic, great storyline, imaginatively executed .
The final book is extremely challenging and awesome as the first three! I'd say book 3 is always the best but this is a close 2nd if not just as good!
The Sorcery series __THE BEST text adventure game ever created__period.
best game

I have yet to defeat this game. It proves a great challenge. Removing the rewind function makes it a much higher stakes game, but I wish there was an option to ignore that. a fun part is that you can explore. Small stuff like eating the mushroom in the 3rd and tripping out before rewinding is fun.
Incredible game with an amazing story. Truly an icon of it's time.
Do not bother with this game. Sorcey 1, 2 and 3 were good but 4 is just tedious. Buy Exiled Kingdoms instead.
Love the whole series of games

Everything about this installment is designed to make you hate the 
experience. The game has maybe 60 minutes of content, but it artificially 
inflates that by forcing you to repeat the last half of the game over and 
over, exhausting the enthusiasm you've built over the previous three games. 
Best way to win this game is not to play it at all.

Topping even Sorcery 3, part 4 is amazingly challenging and rewarding at 
the same time. Be prepared to really think during this one, there's many 
places to explore and many puzzles to solve along the way...

Grrrr... Why did you remove the rewind feature. Can't even bring myself to 
play this without it. It was what set this apart from other similar games. 
Why?

I really hate that you can't rewind. Because if you chose something wrong you need the do the whole thing until that point and it's quite frustrating. Sorry but you killed a really great mechanic. I loved the series up until now

Removing the rewind button was the worst thing you could do, every death feels random and is just annoying. With rewind that works but without its just tedious. I feel myself skipping 99% of the text, I feel like there is no progress anymore.

Game keeps on sending me backwards to a particular point- the game won't save any progress I make past that point. I have emailed developer two times in the past month but have not received any response. I have been a huge fan of the series and am VERY disappointed that I am not able to finish this final chapter.

I couldn't wait for this game to be released, and then lack of the rewind feature killed it for me.  I would LOVE LOVE LOVE it if inkle would make losing this feature optional.  Gaming time is limited for me as I have a family and small children, but even if I didn't I would be totally turned off by having to restart almost the whole game every time I hit a dead end.  I loved the first three installments and the rewind feature allowed me to experience all the games had to offer without using up a lot of time replaying 90% of the games exactly the same way.  After the third or fourth time having to restart and repeat a bunch of the same actions in this installment, I just lost interest.  Sad, because this series is one of the most unique and engaging fantasy story games I've ever experienced, and I've been gaming my whole life.  No matter how cool the story, it is not fun to repeat the same parts of it dozens of times before progressing, and I hate having to use a walkthrough - something the rewind feature in previous games helped me avoid.  Very disappointed.

A triumphant finale. Everyone at Inkle involved in this project should be proud of their work. As with each chapter, Inkle threw a new gameplay curve ball. Some people found it frustrating, but I found the concept novel without making  the game feel difficult. GAMEPLAY SPOILER FOLLOWS:         At a certain point (1/4~1/2) you are cursed with inability to rewind your choices. This means your decisions are committed until you either die or find one of the multiple endings. However, the curse also has you relive your final day -groundhog style- if you die, allowing you to explore and choose another path. Again, some people might find it a chore to skip through passages you've previously seen (Oh no, more re-reading!), but if you've enjoyed the story so far it really isn't a game killer and you might even like the new challenge.
The former games in the series were relaxing and enjoyable while this was more tedious toward the end without getting hints online.

Taking away the rewind feature took away ALL the fun for me. What I loved the most was being able to be curious and seeing what all my options were as I went so that I could choose my path. I'm very disappointed, and don't feel like finishing the game. Not worth the money or the built up hype!
Truly a masterpiece in terms of story, artwork and characters!
Yet another fantastic addition to the sorcery series. I can't get enough of this game. It's been a great adventure.
The removal of the rewind feature made the game so much better. I had to actually think about the choices in stead of just trying them all and choosing the best one.

I enjoyed the writing of this final part, but I am hugely disappointed with the omission of the rewind feature used in 1,2, &3 . This is the least favorite of the series because of this.  I can't explore freely, which is a big plus in the preceding Sorcery apps.  The tedious repetitive play involved in exploring the tower is sad, because of how much better it could be with the rewind. Zed doesn't make it any less tedious once you get in the tower.  I would recommend Sorcery  2 and 3 over this.
A majestic sense of scale, intuition based combat and a spellbook that creates more interesting encounters than any triple A console game
Great ending to a great series!  I can't wait to see what inkle will release next!
Ridiculous moments where overly long sequences are required or you have to go miles back totally ruin this game.

I'm going to miss the Sorcery! games now that they're over... They are absolutely amazing, the best mobile games I've ever played. It took me FOREVER to beat the last one, but it ended very well. Amazing series.
Great game I would love to play more like this all day I still reusing these 4 I can't seem to get to the end of the 4th one I've made it all around where is the crown
Cant finish the game.Always die.
Not sure if I should be blaming inkle or Steve Jackson for that, though.
Complete of this legendary adventure game will become a Legend for years to come

Buy it. It's so rewarding to finish this game. Buy the other ones first. It's challenging and you want to know the end of the story. Persistence and dedication is required to solve the puzzle to victory here.

An incredible game. I'm so sad it's over. Yes it's a little repetitive towards the end but there is such a sense of achievement when you finally get it. Very very clever, hope they make another one like this.
All of the previous titles are playable because they fit the screen but the 4th installment is not displayed correctly and is unplayable. Please fix.
*spoiler alert* not much action at the spike of the sorcerer. No option for rewinding under that mampang shadow thing is exhausting. All and all i think sorcery 2 & 3 are the best.
Had them in the past, still a blast to play

I checked allowed 2 a week to see if this game was out yet. And now that it is and I've played it, totally worth it! I only wish you could...             SPOILERS                          team up with the Archimage!

Seriously disappointed that all my progress was erased with the new version.   That should have been caught before being released! Not sure if it's even worth playing through again.   Huge fan of the series up until now.                          EDIT: issue was fixed after only a few days and all progress restored.   Well done!
Just awesome.
The series is great and I hope they find a way to continue the quest like if you took the crown you become mad with power or if you give it back the king becomes mad
Thank you makers of socery 4!
Exceptional game. The saving game issue is now fixed and I didn't lose any progress. Cheers üçª
Good job on such a quick fix!

As others, I lost my progress after the latest update. Love the game otherwise but not sure I want to walk all that way once again. Edit: Fixed quickly without having to start over. Good job but please, don't do that again.

....fall in love with this EPIC game book series?! One of the most well written, well coded, and well updated (bug fixes) games I've ever played. No exaggeration there at all. A job very well done!!!!
Yep same problem as everyone else, can't save..  once this is fixed I'm sure it will be as good as the first three.
It's a great game, but every time I close the game it resets my progress.
My game was reset too. Each time i exit i must begin again. Unplayable in one sitting. Enjoyable otherwise
Will not save progress.
Well, for the SECOND time,  your update just completely reset my progress! Thank you (not)!
And i was nearly at the end. So disappointing

After i installed Sorcery 4 i played for several hours making tons of progress. When i took a break from playing and reopened the app, All of my progress was lost for some reason. Inkle, if you see this, please fix it.         Thanks-Senan

I find the game to be very good. But huge issue that makes the game impossible for me to enjoy it is that the all progress is lost anytime the app is closed out. Will wait until fix before trying to play it again.

Have loved these games but seems like ages since played last one. I haven't had time to sit down and play for long so when I reopen the game I have to start from beginning or my cloud save :( Is there no way to save the game?
Using a Nexus 6X. The game restarts every time I come back to it. Unplayable.
Consistently resets progress to the beginning upon opening the app. Extremely disappointing after spending so much time on the first three. Please fix ASAP
Favorite Android game series
Thanks for a wonderful game. Replayable and enjoyable every time. The devs should make more and larger games like this..... perhaps even for consoles and same console multiplayer?
I loved the series even sorcery 4 is great. I hate that i can't rewind anymore, but still having fun, epic conclusion to the story by the way. loved it!
CATS <3<3<3! And then... TOP. Bloody hell Inkle! I am absolutely certain Slangg just danced to honor your... deeds. 10/10 would cast ZEd again
This fourth book in the series completes the tale and exceeds expectations.

So sad to finish this story. It‚Äôs just as good as the last 3 and has a really satisfying conclusion. And unlike mass effect 3, your choices actually matter! I‚Äôve found at least ten variations on the ending. The modified rewind mechanic in the last half of the game ramps up the tension, but shouldn‚Äôt be a problem unless you‚Äôre the kind of gamer who needs to be spoon fed every answer. There are plenty of clues in Mampang...even a few secret places to save your progress if you look hard enough ;)

What. A. Ride! This incredible series has brought to life Steve Jackson's epic saga from my childhood in such an incredible way!! The epic conclusion to the monumental quest across the Baklands is just excellent. Completed twice now with satisfyingly different experiences and outcomes along the way. Wholeheartedly recommended, and as always in awe of inkle's consistently superb digital storytelling!!
No rewind mechanic, gameplay was tedious compared to previous games

As a kid, I was a huge fan of the Sorcery! gamebooks with all their spells, and I keep the fondest memories of the mythical 800-sections volume 4, the Crown of Kings. Inkle did a tremendous job using technology to bring the books to the digital age, without ruining what made them truly magical: Steve Jackson's brilliant storytelling. Those are cult games on Android!

I just finished this game and I already want to start again from the beginning. This series is almost infinitly replayable. I've heard rumors of a "new game+" mode. Lastly, removing the rewind was a bold move but agree with their decision. It made the tension feel more real and after finishing the game I felt like I accomplished something.

What I loved about the other games was the exploration and the trial and error. If I messed up, I'd rewind it to a point that I, the player, felt satisfied. This game strips you of that ability. While it increases the tension, it reduces the amount of experimentation I'm willing to do. In the end, I just headed straight for the end game, as I was too afraid I'd mess up and have to fight the final boss with too little health. Not a good design decision in my opinion.

In this unmissable chapter it all comes to the end. Everything wraps up in a setting that is the same as in the books, but plays out in a completely different way. Can't wait to try different endings. I wonder how can I start a new game plus as part I does not allow input of savegame.

I really love Sorcery! series, but make it unwinding in Mampang was the really worst thing you could ever do to the game. It destroys the best what I like about Sorcery! I'm very close to ask for money back.

One star off for mamping being unrewindable and given right back for the fact that it really makes you think about your choices. You can't pick all two or three unless you want to restart the entire city. Which I have done several times. There are multiple paths to get to the end. There are secrets and perks for casting the right spells at the right time. And there are encore performances from many characters. Though only two happen without you hunting for them. I made a goblin fall I'm love with me even.
Loved the original book

I love everything that Inkle have made so far. They have done great things with interactive fiction. I finished Sorcery 1-3 a while ago now and this part has been a long wait - but worth it. I can now conclude the journey (again, 30+ years on).
A fantastic series and a superb finish to the series. But I would say that because Inkle have the crown of kings.

I have bought the previous three games and they were working well on my Samsung Tab S2 and then one day they stop displaying correctly. The Developers have not addressed this issue and it continues on in this fourth installment and I am very sad that day have chose to not fix this bug. Before this the games were very enjoyable but now they are on unplayable. Developers please fix this bug in all your sorcery games. Thank you
Ive bought and played every game so far and this one still delivers, though i am sad its the last installment :(

If you are searching fon a good RPG, look no more as this isn't just a good one, it's the best you will ever find! Everything is included: in depth story, side quests, legendary weapons and magic items, a lot of different characters to meet, fascinating visuals, sorcery, combat, and the most epic adventure to experience! Besides that all, it has kept the old book style, which is absolutely welcome! And the fact that it's a decision based game, you will always find something new each time you play it again!
I loved the series and this was a compelling emotional climax, that made me feel like everything I had put towards the previous games paid off.
The sequel is here!
I have been waiting for this to come out for a while now! A must have android game, play the whole series
The best of all four games!! Such a marvelously done franchise.
I've been waiting so long for the final chapter to come out!
